ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(AND(AND(OR(AND(NOT(ISCHANGED(WelcomeCall_Call_Line_Status__c)),Text(WelcomeCall_Call_Line_Status__c) == 'Closed'), Text(PRIORVALUE(WelcomeCall_Call_Line_Status__c)) == 'Closed'), RecordType.Name =='Welcome Call'), NOT(OR( $Profile.Name == 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name == 'Adminitrator Sistem', $Profile.Name = 'Supervisor-AMFS', $Profile.Name = 'Other Dept AMFS',$Profile.Name = 'Supervisor Collection-AMFS' ))), true, false) && RecordType.Name = 'Welcome Call'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Call Line yang sudah CLOSED hanya bisa di edit oleh Supervisor
